cancel().Description: Cancels the dialog, invoking the @B_android#content#DialogInterface#OnCancelListener_E@. The @B_android#content#DialogInterface#OnDismissListener_E@ may also be called if cancellation dismisses the dialog.
cancel().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 24

dismiss().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 24

ClassDesc: Use a mocking framework like A mock @B_android#content#DialogInterface_E@ class. All methods are non-functional and throw @B_java#lang#UnsupportedOperationException_E@. Override it to provide the operations that you need.
